medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric abdominal pain migrating to right lower quadrant (RLQ)
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with 24 hours of abdominal pain that began as sharp epigastric pain yesterday morning. Pain migrated to RLQ, becoming dull and crampy over several hours. Patient experienced two episodes of non-bloody, non-bilious emesis and one non-bloody, non-diarrheal bowel movement. Symptoms worsened with movement.
